alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Mellette; Southern Jackson; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 11 at 3:41AM MST until January 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST /3 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MST /MIDNIGHT CST/ THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...Bennett County, Mellette County, Todd County, Tripp County and Southern Jackson County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation and the Rosebud Reservation. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 2 PM MST /3 PM CST/ this afternoon. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 11 PM MST /midnight CST/ this evening to 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ Friday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ Friday to 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. A wind chill advisory means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands. A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. Even if you are outdoors for just a few minutes, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Bennett; Mellette; Southern Jackson; Todd; Tripp
